summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning; amending Seattle Municipal Code Sections 23.41.012, 23.47.012, 23.48.010, 23.50.020, 23.50.026, 23.50.028, 23.54.015, 23.54.035, 23.84.032 and 23.86.006 to address the unique needs or features of biotech uses in South Lake Union, and to correct minor errors and omissions.
